nodes.title: How To Transcribe English Into Hebrew: ChangePlan
nodes.description:
Video Translator's platform provides a client with the ability to transcribe
  and translate content to/from a number of languages. Today, we will be using our
  video translation platform on a video from our friends at ChangePlan.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Transcribe English Into Hebrew: ChangePlan
